languages.text: When the wearer uses Intimidation, the targets inflicted with intimidated also gain the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] When the wielder use Intimidation while in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the targets, receiving Intimidated status, also gain {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Staggered{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

When the wearer uses Intimidation, the targets inflicted with intimidated also gain the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
When the wearer uses Intimidation, the targets inflicted with intimidated also gain the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
When the wearer uses Intimidation, the targets inflicted with intimidated also gain the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Когда персонаж применяет Устрашение, цели, на которые наложен испуг, также получают эффект {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломления{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Intimidation, the targets inflicted with intimidated also gain the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда противник применяет Устрашение, цели, на которые наложен испуг, также получают {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломления{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

Когда противник применяет Устрашение, цели, на которые наложен испуг, также получают {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломления{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者使用恐吓敌人时，受到恐吓的目标还会获得{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Intimidation, the targets inflicted with intimidated also gain the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用恐吓敌人时，受到恐吓的目标还会获得{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: 着用者が威嚇を使用した場合、威嚇を受けたターゲットは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Intimidation, the targets inflicted with intimidated also gain the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が威嚇を使用した場合、威嚇を受けたターゲットは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Cuando el portador usa Intimidación, los objetivos intimidados también sufren el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Intimidation, the targets inflicted with intimidated also gain the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador usa Intimidación, los objetivos intimidados también sufren el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger Einschüchterung nutzt, werden die mit diesem Effekt belegten Ziele 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang auch mit {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g} belegt.
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Intimidation, the targets inflicted with intimidated also gain the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger Einschüchterung nutzt, erhalten die mit diesem Effekt beeinflussten Ziele auch den {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g}, und zwar für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur a recours à Intimidation, les cibles intimidées subissent également l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Intimidation, the targets inflicted with intimidated also gain the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur a recours à Intimidation, les cibles intimidées subissent également l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
